heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the 2016 amendments to the Maritime Labour 
Convention 2006 and provide for the ability to extend the validity of a Maritime 
Labour Certificate for a period not exceeding five months after a renewal 
inspection, in the event a new certificate cannot immediately be issued to and 
made available on board that ship. The Maritime Labour Certificate is also 
amended to reflect this change.
